text: Mr. Saturday Night is a 1992 comedy-drama movie that puts a focus toward a comedian named Buddy. Billy Crystal, who also produced, wrote and directed, plays Buddy. Helen Hunt plays for Annie Wells. This was released on September 23, 1992 to theaters by Columbia Pictures. Mr. Saturday Night did not perform well in terms of critic reviews or the box office. Category:1992 comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies about entertainers Category:Movies about comedians
title: Mr. Saturday Night
